description: Default service descriptions for lawn care tenants (informational only, no pricing)

services.title: Lawn Mowing & Edging
services.description: Professional lawn mowing and edging services to keep your grass healthy and your property looking sharp. We provide consistent, reliable service on a weekly or bi-weekly schedule that fits your needs.

services.title: Landscape Maintenance
services.description: Comprehensive landscape maintenance including hedge trimming, mulch bed care, weeding, and seasonal plantings. We keep your entire property looking professionally maintained year-round.

services.title: Lawn Fertilization & Treatment
services.description: Professional fertilization and treatment programs designed to promote healthy, lush grass growth while controlling weeds and pests. We customize treatment plans based on your lawn's specific needs and local climate.

services.title: Seasonal Cleanup
services.description: Thorough spring and fall cleanup services to prepare your property for the changing seasons. We remove leaves, trim back perennials, clean beds, and get your yard ready for the months ahead.

services.title: Aeration & Overseeding
services.description: Core aeration and overseeding services to improve lawn health and thickness. Aeration relieves soil compaction while overseeding fills in bare spots and improves grass density.
